remarks: Lemma for ~ iblpos .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-Jul-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2014.)
statement:
iblrelem.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. RR ) $.
iblpos.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> 0 <_ B ) $.
iblposlem $p |- ( ph -> ( S.2 ` ( x e. RR |-> if ( ( x e. A /\ 0 <_ -u B ) , -u B , 0 ) ) ) = 0 ) $.
$d A x $.
$d ph x $.
